commit.message:
Enhance documentation of -fprofile-note option.

2019-07-09  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	* doc/invoke.texi: Add link from -fprofile-dir option.
	Use better wording for 'gcno filename'.

From-SVN: r273262

files.patch:

+
+	* doc/invoke.texi: Add link from -fprofile-dir option.
+	Use better wording for 'gcno filename'.
